metadata.name: The Rumor
metadata.description:
Rumors of the Wretch spread fast across the war torn streets of the Old World.

Directed by Sygmod  
3D work by Sygmod and Hilly HD (https://linktr.ee/hillyhd)  
Vision VI Suit Design by EvijanJohn (https://linktr.ee/Ethereumhomies)

Voice Acting by Sherry CB and Lisa Colquhoun (@lsmcolquhoun on IG)

Score by Primoux (https://linktr.ee/primoux)

Special Thanks to Juno for audio help (https://twitter.com/juno_ofc)

Note: This token was previously minted on Tezos (XTZ). The XTZ version is considered discontinued. All XTZ owners have been airdropped this new ETH version. 
Any future utility or narrative interaction with 'The Rumor' tokens will be based on these ETH mints.  This is the token you are looking for.
